Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-5678 affecting package openssl for versions less than 1.1.1k-28
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-5678 affecting package openssl for versions less than 1.1.1k-28. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package openssl is earlier than 1.1.1k-28, affected by CVE-2023-5678
